rules_text:
Enchant Legendary Creature
Enchanted permanent is indestructible.
[i]Goddess of Chaos[/i] – Whenever enchanted creature attacks, shuffle target permanent into its owner's library. That player that reveals the top card of their library until they reveal a nonland card. They may cast the revealed card this turn without paying its mana cost. Put the rest of the revealed cards on the bottom of that player's library.
